thread.title: Here Is All The Sparkling Bollywood Fashion From The 62nd JIO Filmfare Awards Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Here Is All The Sparkling Bollywood Fashion From The 62nd JIO Filmfare Awards Red Carpet

title: Here Is All The Sparkling Bollywood Fashion From The 62nd JIO Filmfare Awards Red Carpet
text:
facebook 103 SHARES 
Bollywoodâ€™s most revered award show is back amid much fanfare as per usual. Decked in designer finery, the all-too-familiar faces have religiously turned up for the 62nd Jio Filmfare Awards show, which is currently underway, in Mumbai. Since the Filmfare awards are considered the Indian equivalent of the Oscars, the actresses brought out their meticulously-sourced couture (thanks to a stylist-led entourage) for a night replete with legends and to-be-legends. Hereâ€™s looking at all the fabulously dressed ladies from the night! 
1. Thinking womanâ€™s actress Kalki Koechlin decided to participate in a little pun and dressed like an Oscar trophy at the event. Her Nikhil Thampi gown had enough sparkle to power a city! A photo posted by Nikhil Thampi (@nikhilthampi) on Jan 14, 2017 at 9:01am PST 
2. Sonam Kapoor, in her floral Ellie Saab gown, looked prepared to dish out an acceptance speech anytime. Accompanying her list-topping look were dramatic berry-lips and made-to-look-lazy-girl hair. This outfit deserves a double post as does @sonamkapoor best actress nomination. I have the craziest team of troopers @chandiniw @spacemuffin27 @vani12gupta @abhilashatd @jeevikab without whom I can't even begin to do what I do anymore #relic A photo posted by Rhea Kapoor (@rheakapoor) on Jan 14, 2017 at 7:38am PST 
3. Raveena Tandon gave a giant peek into her trend-cred as she stepped out in the colour of the season. The monochrome yellow gown was enough proof that the much-loved actress is well past her 90s fancy dress-up days. @officialraveenatandon looks like a goddess at the #jiofilmfareawards #idivaatfilmfareawards A photo posted by iDiva (@idivaofficial) on Jan 14, 2017 at 8:43am PST 
4. Jacqueline Fernandez, shimmering in a trailing Ali Yonous gown, was poised to seize a sizeable amount of social media dough during, and post the event. #JacquelineFernandez at the #redcarpet of #FilmfareAwards ! #filmfare #filmfareindia #jiofilmfareawards #filmfareawards2017 #bollywood #happeningnow A photo posted by Edition Pakistan (@edition.pk) on Jan 14, 2017 at 8:13am PST 
5. Parineeti Chopra rose, and she literally did rise, to the occasion in a pageant-winning Mark Bumgarner gown. Will someone declare her as the Princess of Genera, already? This beauty in a @markbumgarner creation, @thediamondgallery_in earrings & @aurellebyleshnashah ring for the #filmfareawards2017 tonight! @akanksha_kapur @gurleenarora17 #jiofilmfareawards A photo posted by Sanjana Batra (@sanjanabatra) on Jan 14, 2017 at 7:47am PST 
6. Sridevi dressed up as herself â€“ shiny like Bollywood royalty, contoured like a baller celeb and ethereal AF, in a black embellished gown. Now that's classic old world Bollywood glamour! #Sridevi and #BoneyKapoor make a dazzling appearance at the #JioFilmfareAwards. A photo posted by Filmfare (@filmfare) on Jan 14, 2017 at 8:44am PST 
7. Shilpa Shetty added to the frenzy in an asymmetrical Manish Malhotra gown that resembled a golden waterfall that you wouldnâ€™t dare go near. Leave it to the Shetty sisters to up the glam quotient! #idivaatfilmfareawards #jiofilmfareawards #heels #love #gown A photo posted by iDiva (@idivaofficial) on Jan 14, 2017 at 8:38am PST 
8. Sunny Leone worked every single cutout of her red Swapnil Shindehalter gown. Her pulled-back hair induced equal envy as those sculpted clavicles. @sunnyleone gets a smashing ğŸ’¯ in this wine red dream by @officialswapnilshinde and styled by @hitendrakapopra. Cut outs galore ğŸ’˜ #JioFilmfareAwards â¤ .... #jacquelinefernandez #KareenaKapoorKhan #parineetichopra #urvashirautela #sunnyleone #bollywood #actress #shraddhakapoor #ileanadcruz #aishwaryarai #anushkasharma #sonakshisinha #deepikapadukone #fashion #kareenakapoor #katrinakaif #aliabhatt #ranbirkapoor #sonamkapoor #hrithikroshan #dishapatani #tigershroff #shahrukhkhan #shahidkapoor #salmankhan #varundhawan #johnabraham #meganfox #priyankachopra â¤â¤ A photo posted by Sunny Leone FC ğŸ’Ÿ (@sunnyleonelife) on Jan 14, 2017 at 9:57am PST 
9. Thigh-high gowns still reign supreme as demonstrated by Kriti Sanon who put up a smokeshow in her Shehla by Shehla Khan slip number. A photo posted by News of Bollywood (@bollywoodnewsonline) on Jan 14, 2017 at 10:16am PST 
10. Esha Gupta spelled hella sexy in a Georges Hobeika gown, heroine-waves and accessories from Gehna Jewellers. StunnerğŸ’— Esha Gupta in @georgeshobeika for Filmfare tonight ğŸ’• Jewels by @gehnajewellers1 , styled with @reannmoradian @wardrobist #wardrobist #stylefile @filmfare A photo posted by Aastha Sharma (@aasthasharma612) on Jan 14, 2017 at 8:24am PST 
11. Sonakshi Sinha matched her cool-girl lob with a ruffled black Gauri & Nainika gown which flawlessly put on display her strenuous hours in the gym. #SonakshiSinha looking amazing in this outfit at #JioFilmfareAwards 2017 Related Tags â‡’ #Bollywood #Celebrity #BollywoodIGN #BollywoodStars #BollywoodActor #BollywoodActress #Celebrities #CelebrityStyle #CelebStyle #CelebFashion #CelebrityLifestyle #BollywoodCelebrity #BollywoodPhotoshoot #JioFilmfareAwards2017 A photo posted by Bollywood IGN (@bollywoodign) on Jan 14, 2017 at 12:08pm PST 
12. Alia Bhatt channeled her inner Disney princess and stunned in a slip ball gown that was instantly a photo-op hit. She's so damn cute !!! @aliaabhatt ğŸ’ğŸ’‹ğŸ˜ğŸ’¥ğŸ”¥âœ¨â¤ğŸ˜˜ @filmfare red carpet ğŸ”¥ğŸ’¥ğŸ“¸ â€¢â€¢ #aliabhattfans #aliabhatt #cutiepie #hot #gorgeous #beautiful #dearzindagi #loveyouzindagi #filmfare #awards #jiofilmfareawards #2017 #redcarpet #karanjohar #promotions #dharmaproductions #bollywood #instabollywood #bollywoodblogger #bollywoodupdates #fashionandstyle #fashionblogger #fashion #instablogger #instablog #instagrammer #instagram #movies #showbiz A photo posted by Alia Bhatt (@aliaabhatt008) on Jan 14, 2017 at 11:37am PST 
13. A strapless Amit Agarwal was chosen by Saiyami Kher for her Filmfare debut. A retro updo and long earrings finished out the actress' look. . #Bollywood #SaiyamiKher at #JioFilmFareAwards Rate the look 0...10? . #Ø¨ÙˆÙ„ÙŠÙˆÙˆØ¯ #Ø³ÙŠØ§Ù…ÙŠ_Ø®ÙŠØ± ÙÙŠ Ø­ÙÙ„ ÙÙŠÙ„Ù… ÙÙŠØ± A photo posted by Only Bollywood ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ (@onlybollywood1) on Jan 14, 2017 at 7:45am PST 
14. Swara Bhaskar looked like a runaway bride in her strapless white gown, redeeming herself of all her previous award show's fails. #SwaraBhaskar walks the #RedCarpet at the #JioFilmfareAwards #Filmfare A photo posted by salil sand (@salilsand) on Jan 14, 2017 at 8:11am PST 
15. Sonali Bendre emerged in a cleavage-baring anarkali that secured her status as one of the finest things to have happened to Bollywood. #SonaliBendre at #JioFilmfareAwards 2017 Related Tags â‡’ #Bollywood #Celebrity #BollywoodIGN #BollywoodStars #BollywoodActor #BollywoodActress #Celebrities #CelebrityStyle #CelebStyle #CelebFashion #CelebrityLifestyle #BollywoodCelebrity #bollywoodphotoshoot A photo posted by Bollywood IGN (@bollywoodign) on Jan 14, 2017 at 11:41am PST 
16. Diana Penty stuck to the all-black club in an Alfazairy velvet gown, pulled-back hair and cult-screaming smokey eyes. Rate her look ğŸ‘‰ 1....ğŸ”Ÿ Diana Penty looks stunning in Black on the red carpet of Jio Filmfare Awards 2017 @InstantBollywood â¤â¤â¤ . . #photo @graziaindia #dianapenty #filmfare #filmfareindia #filmfareawards #filmfareawards2016 #jiofilmfareawards #filmfareawards2017 #bollywood A photo posted by Instant Bollywood (@instantbollywood) on Jan 14, 2017 at 11:43am PST 
17. Tamannaah Bhatia did a flawless rendition of a space-siren in a metallic Peter Langer gown, sleek hair and award-winning dewy face. @tamannaahspeaks gorgeous in this amazing @peterlangner gown and @isharya jewellery red carpet ready in Chennai last night! A photo posted by Sanjana Batra (@sanjanabatra) on Jan 13, 2017 at 10:54pm PST 
17. Pooja Hegde played a little peek-a-boo with her black velvet strapless gown that was straight fire from below the waist. . . Ø¨ÙˆØ¬Ø§ Ù‡ÙŠØ¯Ø¬ÙŠ ğŸ’œ Ø­Ù„Ùˆ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù„Ù‡ ğŸ˜ Ø¨Ø³ Ù…Ù† ØªØ­Øª ÙƒØ°Ø§ Ø´ÙˆÙŠ Ù…Ø®Ø±Ø¨ØŒ Ø¨Ø³ ØªØ¸Ù„ ÙƒÙŠÙˆØªğŸ’•ğŸ’• . . . . . . #PoojaHegde #JioFilmfareAwards #Filmfare A photo posted by Ø§Ù…Ù„ | Amal (@iamhefx) on Jan 14, 2017 at 6:58am PST 
18. Hot Mama Mira Rajput accompanied boo Shahid Kapur wearing a heavy-duty floral embroidery dress and a signature star-wife smile. ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ #filmfareAwards #shahidmira #shahidkapoor #mirarajputkapoor #mirakapoor #mirarajput #shamira A photo posted by Mira Rajput Kapoor (@mira.kapoor.fc) on Jan 14, 2017 at 9:23am PST 
19. Priety Zinta looked nothing short of stunning in a yellow one-shoulder gown, reminding us why we we've been obsessed with her all along! #PreityZinta A photo posted by preity zinta ostashova (@darya_ostashova) on Jan 14, 2017 at 9:22am PST 
20. Neha Dhupia kept things in the territory of minimal (but, still, very very cute) in a pussy-bow monochrome gown and an Elizabethan updo.
